alert.note: Alert for Glacier; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 22 at 7:26PM MDT until August 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Glacier County in north central Montana... Northwestern Toole County in north central Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 725 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cut Bank, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail and localized heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cut Bank, Ethridge and Santa Rita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
